messages.hero_description: Boot straight into your retro library. One launchpad for emulators, ROMs, save states, shaders, and couch co-op nights.

cli.usage_header: 🚀 REVOLUTIONARY CODEGEN - Revolutionary Project Generation System
cli.feature_2: • Business logic classes with initialize/execute pattern
cli.feature_3: • Aggregate hierarchy generation with unlimited nesting
cli.generator_1: • Project Structure Generator: Creates folder hierarchy and static files
cli.generator_2: • Business Logic Generator: Creates classes with initialize/execute pattern
cli.generator_3: • Specification Editor: Interactive editing with validation

jokes.dark_mode: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs! 🐛
jokes.broke_developer: Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache! 💸
jokes.java_glasses: Why do Java programmers wear glasses? Because they can't C#! 👓
jokes.sad_function: Why was the function so sad? It had too many arguments! 😢
jokes.love_nature: Why do programmers love nature? It has no bugs! 🌳

error_messages.specification_required: Project specification is required (specPath or specification option)

validation_messages.business_classes_array: Business logic classes must be an array
validation_messages.class_name_invalid: Class name '{name}' must follow PascalCase convention
validation_messages.method_name_invalid: Method name '{name}' must follow camelCase convention
validation_messages.property_name_invalid: Property name '{name}' must follow camelCase convention
validation_messages.parameter_name_invalid: Parameter name '{name}' must follow camelCase convention
validation_messages.interface_name_invalid: Interface name '{name}' must follow PascalCase convention
validation_messages.enum_name_invalid: Enum name '{name}' must follow PascalCase convention
validation_messages.namespace_name_invalid: Namespace name '{name}' must follow snakeCase convention
validation_messages.file_name_invalid: File name '{name}' must follow snake_case convention
validation_messages.out_of_range: Value {value} is out of range for {field}: {min} - {max}

templates.businessClass: Template for business logic classes with initialize/execute pattern
templates.dataClass: Template for data classes with validation and type safety
templates.factoryClass: Template for factory classes with dependency injection
templates.aggregateClass: Template for aggregate classes with unlimited nesting
templates.serviceClass: Template for service classes with error handling
templates.controllerClass: Template for controller classes with request handling
templates.utilityClass: Template for utility classes with helper functions
